response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering holds significant value for us, reflecting its exceptional quality and capabilities. Given its importance to us, we are considering an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special price. We propose a transaction of $12,000 for this remarkable product. We believe this price reflects its true worth while providing you with a valuable asset. Should you be interested in exploring this further, please let us know. We look forward to potentially working together.", "product_price": 12000}
